name: Birds With Bats (Mini Jam99)
description:
Birds with Bats was created for MiniJam 99 : Birds. And features a simplistic turn-based RPG system where two pet birds face off against a dastardly pigeon & sparrow. 

Limit: Cant stop moving, so these birds cant stop bopping

Made in 72 hrs, Birds with Bats was a collaborative effort between;

OhDamnItsJam - Programming 

& 

ilPrinny - Art
